name: Please adopt me. # AI needs repair.
name_original: Please adopt me. # AI needs repair.
description:
Use your console system and play 3 games to repair your AI system!
Find about the secrets of this unknown system with AI, get to know each other, spend time together, and have fun.

Console System

For unknown reasons, the AI system have to function through a separate CUI console system.
With AI, operate the system and check the depth of the system.

Three games

Repairing your AI system is achieved through playing three games.
Platformer , Puzzle and Danmaku.

If you've done the repair, you can do full recovery challenge such as 'Time Attack' and 'Extra Item Recovery' by activating special settings.

Communication with AI

We talk a lot with AI in the process of repair.
Even if it's not directly related to repair, spend time with AI doing something.
Rock-paper-scissors and Bingo are also the games you can play with AI.

Customermized Function

Diverse AI styles, decorations, hairstyles, etc. with data obtained during repair.
Decorate the wallpaper your console system to suit your taste.
